name: Tuitbot
description: Bridges Tuitbot MCP tools into OpenClaw for AI agent integration

tuitbotBinaryPath.description: Path to the tuitbot binary. Defaults to 'tuitbot' (resolved via PATH).

configPath.description: Path to the tuitbot config.toml file. Defaults to ~/.tuitbot/config.toml.

allowedTools.description: Allowlist of MCP tool names to register. Empty or omitted = register all tools that pass other filters.

enableMutations.description: Enable mutation tools (post, reply, like, follow, approve). Default: false (safe startup).

allowCategories.description: Category inclusion filter. Only these categories are registered. Omit to allow all.

denyCategories.description: Category exclusion filter. These categories are blocked. Omit to deny none.

maxRiskLevel.description: Risk ceiling. Tools above this level are blocked. Default: 'high' (no ceiling).
